health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions were held on the Mombasa County Tax Waiver and Variation Bill, 2015, including regulations for tax waivers and variations.
health_sector_decisions: Decisions regarding tax waivers and variations were made as per the Mombasa County Tax Waiver and Variation Bill, 2015.
health_evidence_base: The discussions were based on the provisions of the legislation and the need for transparency in the administration of taxes and revenue.
